name: The N-Body Shop
tagline: Documentation for software developed in collaboration with the N-Body Shop
body:
## Welcome to the N-Body Shop Github pages
Other web content can be found at [the University of Washington](http://www-hpcc.astro.washington.edu).

A few key software packages are listed here.

### ChaNGa
This is a massively parallel astrophysical N-body/SPH package.  Documentation can be found on the [wiki](https://github.com/N-BodyShop/changa/wiki)

### Salsa
This is a parallel visualization package for ChaNGa output.  Documentation can be found on the [wiki](https://github.com/N-BodyShop/salsa/wiki)

### Tipsy
This is a classic visualization tool for N-body simulations.  Documentation can be found by [reading the code](https://github.com/N-BodyShop/tipsy/tree/master/code).

### Authors and Contributors
There are a cast of thousands.

### Support
Use the issue trackers on the appropriate github repository to report problems.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
